KonnichiWa Gang--Just saw where Kuchi, Japan has named their new airport 
Kuchi Ryoto in honor of Ryoto Sakamoto the Samurai warrior from Kenshin 
Himura's era (1860's). He was very active in the war which put Emporer Meiji 
in power. Anybody know if he was a Hitokori Battousai? What was his clan? 
Domo arigato for the aid. Happy Thanksgiving and Happy Birthday to Classic 
Kei(Dirty Pair/Lovely Angels)(11-27-2121)and Happy Anniversary to my Mom and 
Dad--all tomorrow the 27th!! Be sure to check out Tom Cruise in The Last 
Samurai next month! See ya soon--Keiman and Kei.
